title: What’s next for Tadej Pogačar? No Vuelta a España, but the worlds are on
content:
'He deserves a bit of calm', but no rest for a hungry bike racer: Pogačar to take aim at rainbow jersey and considers future runs at Giro and Vuelta.

Read the full article at What’s next for Tadej Pogačar? No Vuelta a España, but the worlds are on on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
